nodes.id: 中国共产党通道侗族自治县委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党通道侗族自治县委员会
中共通道侗族自治县委

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在湖南省怀化市通道侗族自治县的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Tongdao Dong Autonomous County, Huaihua, Hunan.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共通道侗族自治县委书记，后因受贿、巨额财产来源不明被判刑。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Secretary of the CPC Tongdao Dong Autonomous County Committee, later sentenced for bribery and possessing large amounts of property from unknown sources.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共通道侗族自治县委书记，后因涉嫌严重违纪违法被查处。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Secretary of the CPC Tongdao Dong Autonomous County Committee, later investigated for serious violations of discipline and law.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共通道侗族自治县委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Secretary of the CPC Tongdao Dong Autonomous County Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共通道侗族自治县委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Secretary of the CPC Tongdao Dong Autonomous County Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中共通道侗族自治县委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, current Secretary of the CPC Tongdao Dong Autonomous County Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党通道侗族自治县代表大会

zh-cn: 中国共产党通道侗族自治县代表大会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党通道侗族自治县委员会的上级机构。
description.en: The superior organization of the CPC Tongdao Dong Autonomous County Committee.

en: Constitution of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的根本法规，规定其组织架构和行为准则。
description.en: The fundamental regulations of the Communist Party of China, which stipulates its organizational structure and code of conduct.

nodes.id: 通道侗族自治县人民政府

zh-cn: 通道侗族自治县人民政府

description.zh-cn: 通道侗族自治县的国家行政机关。
description.en: The state administrative organ of Tongdao Dong Autonomous County.

description.zh-cn: 湖南省怀化市的中级人民法院。
description.en: The Intermediate People's Court of Huaihua City, Hunan Province.

nodes.id: 中国共产党湖南省纪律检查委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党湖南省纪律检查委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在湖南省的纪律检查机关。
description.en: The discipline inspection organ of the Communist Party of China in Hunan Province.

description.zh-cn: 湖南省的国家监察机关。
description.en: The state supervisory organ of Hunan Province.

description.zh-cn: 湖南省的国家检察机关。
description.en: The state procuratorial organ of Hunan Province.

nodes.id: 湘西土家族苗族自治州中级人民法院

zh-cn: 湘西土家族苗族自治州中级人民法院
湘西自治州中级人民法院

description.zh-cn: 湖南省湘西土家族苗族自治州的中级人民法院。
description.en: The Intermediate People's Court of Xiangxi Tujia and Miao Autonomous Prefecture, Hunan Province.

relationships.target: 中国共产党通道侗族自治县委员会

description.zh-cn: 李先胜于2004年至2008年期间担任中共通道侗族自治县委书记。
description.en: Li Xiansheng served as Secretary of the CPC Tongdao Dong Autonomous County Committee from 2004 to 2008.

relationships.target: 中国共产党通道侗族自治县委员会

description.zh-cn: 杨先荣于2010年11月至2013年8月期间担任中共通道侗族自治县委书记。
description.en: Yang Xianrong served as Secretary of the CPC Tongdao Dong Autonomous County Committee from November 2010 to August 2013.

relationships.target: 中国共产党通道侗族自治县委员会

description.zh-cn: 印宇鹰于2013年8月至2021年4月期间担任中共通道侗族自治县委书记。
description.en: Yin Yuying served as Secretary of the CPC Tongdao Dong Autonomous County Committee from August 2013 to April 2021.

relationships.target: 中国共产党通道侗族自治县委员会

description.zh-cn: 毛运鸿于2021年5月至2023年10月期间担任中共通道侗族自治县委书记。
description.en: Mao Yunhong served as Secretary of the CPC Tongdao Dong Autonomous County Committee from May 2021 to October 2023.

relationships.target: 中国共产党通道侗族自治县委员会

description.zh-cn: 覃歇民自2023年10月起担任中共通道侗族自治县委书记。
description.en: Tan Xiemin has been serving as Secretary of the CPC Tongdao Dong Autonomous County Committee since October 2023.

relationships.source: 中国共产党通道侗族自治县委员会
relationships.target: 中国共产党通道侗族自治县代表大会

description.zh-cn: 根据信息框，中国共产党通道侗族自治县代表大会是中国共产党通道侗族自治县委员会的上级机构。
description.en: According to the infobox, the CPC Tongdao Dong Autonomous County Congress is the superior organization of the CPC Tongdao Dong Autonomous County Committee.

relationships.source: 中国共产党通道侗族自治县委员会

description.zh-cn: 作为中国共产党的县级地方组织，中共通道侗族自治县委隶属于中国共产党。
description.en: As a county-level local organization of the Communist Party of China, the CPC Tongdao Dong Autonomous County Committee is subordinate to the Communist Party of China.

relationships.target: 中国共产党通道侗族自治县委员会

description.zh-cn: 根据信息框，《中国共产党章程》是中国共产党通道侗族自治县委员会的授权法源。
description.en: According to the infobox, the Constitution of the Communist Party of China is the authorizing legal source for the CPC Tongdao Dong Autonomous County Committee.

relationships.source: 通道侗族自治县人民政府
relationships.target: 中国共产党通道侗族自治县委员会

description.zh-cn: 在中国，地方同级党委领导同级政府。信息框中将通道侗族自治县人民政府列于县委之下。
description.en: In China, the local party committee at the same level leads the government at the same level. The infobox lists the People's Government of Tongdao Dong Autonomous County under the County Party Committee.

description.zh-cn: 2009年3月13日，怀化市中级人民法院对李先胜受贿、巨额财产来源不明案作出一审判决，判处其有期徒刑10年。
description.en: On March 13, 2009, the Huaihua Intermediate People's Court sentenced Li Xiansheng to 10 years in prison in a first-instance verdict for bribery and possessing large amounts of property from unknown sources.

relationships.source: 中国共产党湖南省纪律检查委员会

description.zh-cn: 2024年4月14日，印宇鹰因涉嫌严重违纪违法，接受湖南省纪委监委纪律审查和监察调查。同年8月，他被开除党籍和公职。
description.en: On April 14, 2024, Yin Yuying was placed under disciplinary review and supervisory investigation by the Hunan Provincial Commission for Discipline Inspection and Supervision for suspected serious violations of discipline and law. In August of the same year, he was expelled from the Party and public office.

description.zh-cn: 2024年4月14日，印宇鹰因涉嫌严重违纪违法，接受湖南省纪委监委纪律审查和监察调查。
description.en: On April 14, 2024, Yin Yuying was placed under disciplinary review and supervisory investigation by the Hunan Provincial Commission for Discipline Inspection and Supervision for suspected serious violations of discipline and law.

description.zh-cn: 2024年9月，湖南省人民检察院依法以涉嫌受贿罪、行贿罪对印宇鹰作出逮捕决定。
description.en: In September 2024, the Hunan Provincial People's Procuratorate made a decision to arrest Yin Yuying on suspicion of bribery and offering bribes.

relationships.source: 湘西土家族苗族自治州中级人民法院

description.zh-cn: 2024年12月19日，湘西土家族苗族自治州中级人民法院一审开庭审理印宇鹰受贿、行贿案。
description.en: On December 19, 2024, the Xiangxi Tujia and Miao Autonomous Prefecture Intermediate People's Court held the first-instance trial of Yin Yuying's case of bribery and offering bribes.
